identity.name: AdvocacyFlow
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode (Primary) - Focus on clarity and trust

dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Fixed) + Main Feed (Scrollable) + Right Panel (Optional Stats)

message_card.description: The core unit of the feed. Mimics a Slack message but elevated.
structure: Header: Avatar (Left) + Name (Bold) + Time (Muted) + Channel Tag (Badge)
Body: Text Content (Inter) + Rich Media Preview (Rounded-lg)
Footer: Action Bar with 'Send to WhatsApp' as primary pill button
message_card.styling: bg-white border border-slate-200/60 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:border-indigo-100 transition-colors

otp_modal.description: Clean, focused modal for phone verification.
otp_modal.styling: max-w-md w-full p-8 rounded-3xl bg-white shadow-2xl

general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, friendly feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Implement the 'Send to WhatsApp' flow as a multi-step process: Click Button -> Check if Phone Exists -> (If No) Open OTP Modal -> (If Yes) Open WhatsApp Web.
Ensure the 'InputOTP' component is used for the verification screen.
Do not use generic gray backgrounds; use 'slate-50' or very subtle tints.
animations: Add 'hover:scale-[1.02]' to message cards for a tactile feel.
Use 'AnimatePresence' (Framer Motion) for the OTP modal entrance.
Button clicks should have a subtle 'active:scale-95' effect.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
